page.title: 18A MODERN INDUSTRY
page.content: MODERN PRODUCTS WAS SET UP IN THE VILLAGE IN 1966 TO MAKE FIBRE-GLASS MOULDINGS,HAVING MOVED FROM THE MANUFACTURE OF FISH-TANKS IN SCUNTHORPE.18 PEOPLE FROM SCUNTHORPE OR LOCAL VILLAGES ARE EMPLOYED,MAKING ROUNDABOUTS,SLIDES, ETC.FOR LEISURE PARKS OR HOLIDAY CAMPS AND MAINTAINING THE EQUIPMENT.THIS ACCOUNTS FOR 60% OF THE BUSINESS.EQUIPMENT FOR THE OIL AND MALTING INDUSTRIES IS ALSO MADE.A MIXTURE OF GLASS FIBRES ,RESIN AND A CATALYST ARE SPRAYED ONTO A MOULD WITH A SPECIAL GUN.AFTER REMOVAL ,THE EDGES OF THE MOULDING ARE TRIMMED WITH A DIAMOND CUTTER,THE BLADES OF WHICH COST Â£125 AND LAST ABOUT A MONTH.THE FIRM ALSO MAKES ALL THE ELECTRONICS AND WOOD AND METAL PARTS OF THE EQUIPMENT.SOME OF THE LARGER EQUIPMENT NOW USE COMPUTERIZED SYSTEMS WHICH THE FIRM ALSO MAKES.
